content.prompt: Population patterns shown on the map indicate that areas around river deltas and upland lake and river valleys have higher densities. Which of the following best explains why these regions are more heavily populated?

choices.label: These regions have access to international trade.
These regions experience seasonal climate variation.
These regions have higher carrying capacities.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
